short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get RGB and HEX color values from any image

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Image Color Picker" is a user-friendly Chrome extension that allows you to effortlessly pick and identify colors from any image. Simply upload an image file, click anywhere on the image, and instantly receive the RGB and HEX color codes for the selected area. Perfect for designers, developers, and anyone in need of precise color values.

Key Features:
- Supports multiple image formats, including PNG, JPG, GIF, BMP, and more.
- One-click copy of RGB and HEX color values.
- Minimalistic interface designed for simplicity and ease of use.
- Works entirely offline for privacy and security.

Whether youâ€™re working on a website, creating digital art, or designing a presentation, "Image Color Picker" is your go-to tool for accurate color selection.
